attributes.action: Exempt foreign NHS staff paying the Immigration Health Surcharge.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to change its policy so these essential health workers are made exempt from this unfair surcharge given they are saving the lives of the British public but at the same time paying twice for the same health care they are providing.
attributes.background: The Immigration Health Surcharge will go up from 400 pounds to over 600 pounds. This is paid by foreign born workers in the UK who also pay tax and NI.  It includes doctors and nurses who are on the front line against coronavirus. It is wrong they pay twice for the healthcare you only pay for once.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301907

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
